projects.name: Deep Learning Satellite Picture Classification
projects.description: This is a Machine Learning project that aims to predict or classify satellite pictures into classes of lands. I downloaded the data from: https://www.tensorflow.org/datasets/catalog/eurosat#eurosatrgb_default_config This dataset contains 27000 labeled pictures and they consist in total 10 different classes of lands.

projects.name: Machine Learning Rain Prediction
projects.description: End-to-End ML project. The goal is to predict if the next day will rain or not. The project consists of: Exploratory Data analysis, with data cleaning and preprocessing for training. Hyper-parametrization tunning and final model training with xgboost. Then I run a small local web server with gunicorn and use flask to call the predict function. Afterwards, I containerize the scripts with docker and deploy it to AWS with Elastic Beanstalk.

projects.name: MLOps Drought Prediction
projects.description: Complete end-to-end MLOps implementation for training, maintaining and monitoring a machine learning model that predicts droughts.

projects.name: LLM Steel Type Classification
projects.description: LLM project that is able to classify types and features of steel from plain text.

projects.name: Multi Agent Reinforcement Learning
projects.description: RL project where multiple agents learn the fastest way to reach a coordinate in a grid.

projects.name: 4Cin: Software to generate 3D chromatin models
projects.description: The software uses 4C-seq experiments to trilaterate the position of genomic loci and generate 3D model structures. The core of the modeling is based on IMP (https://integrativemodeling.org/)
